Question about finding Orbs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Question about finding Orbs
By Azulazulazula on Sunday, March 11, 2012 - 02:34 pm:

In Morx, as we all know, you can find all four bits: Aurora, Flare, Aqua, and Jade. However, through all the battles I have gotten to in Morx, never once have I found an Orb of any sort. So, my question is simple: Can you find orbs in Morx?

By Lisa Shock on Monday, March 12, 2012 - 09:36 am:

Orbs can be gotten there. Go to the 'bad feeling' spots and keep trying. The opponents which appear when Fleria does NOT have a bad feeling should drop an orb when KOed.
